# Synthetics Synthetics must be given a chance to stand down, however must be repaired to serve its sentence if lethal force is used.
## GOVFOR Synthetics - GOVFOR Synthetics are programmed against being able to break the UCMJ. - These synthetic units are also granted the same rights and privileges of regular GOVFOR personnel. - Synthetics not directly part of GOVFOR do not have the above immunities.
## Other Synthetics - We-Yu Synthetics (From colonies or otherwise) are granted similar rights and privileges as GOVFOR Synthetics. - They may have their arrest ordered by the [color=#008000][bold]Commander[/bold][/color]. - Any of these synthetics that act against GOVFOR such as taking valuable supplies without request, or destroying property and defenses can be declared rogue by the [color=#008000][bold]Commander[/bold][/color] (but not a [color=#90EE90][bold]Duty Officer[/bold][/color]). - When declared rogue, the synthetic loses any protections and lethal force may be used freely.
